name: Calculus I
description: Introduction to derivatives and integrals of functions of one variable.

name: Calculus II
description: Continuation of Calculus I. Introduction to multivariable calculus.

name: Linear Algebra
description: Introduction to vectors, matrices, linear transformations, and systems of linear equations.

name: Math Analysis I
description: Introduction to real analysis. Includes construction of the real number system, sequences, series, continuous functions, derivatives, integrals, and the fundamental theorem of calculus.

name: Algebra I
description: Introduction to abstract algebra. Includes groups, rings, fields, and polynomials.

name: Algebra II
description: Continuation of Algebra I. Includes theory of equations, Galois theory, and modules.

name: Topology I
description: Introduction to topology. Includes topics such as topological spaces, connectedness, and compactness.

name: Topology II
description: Continuation of Topology I. Includes topics such as homotopy, homology, and manifolds.
